Package org.vaadin.addons.criteriacontainersample

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractBeanTupleApplication
    Shared core for applications demonstrating the BeanTupleContainer features.
    AbstractEntityApplication
    Shared core for applications demonstrating the CriteriaContainer features.
    BeanTupleCustomFilteringApplication
    Demonstrate use of BeanTupleContainer.
    BeanTupleSimpleFilteringApplication
    Demonstrate use of BeanTupleContainer.
    EntityCustomFilteringApplication
    Example application demonstrating how to implement queries and filtering by extending a query definition.
    EntityParameterizedFilteringApplication
    Example application demonstrating how to implement queries and filtering by extending a query definition.
    EntitySimpleFilteringApplication
    Example application demonstrating how to use the generic CritQueryDefinition to fetch entities and to perform filtering on a container.
